name: Future Smart Cities (FSC) - 4th Edition
content: A Smart City is a city well-performing in a forward-looking way in these six characteristics (smart economy, smart people, smart governance, smart mobility, smart environment, smart living), built on the ‘smart’ combination of endowments and activities of self-decisive, independent and aware citizens’, Possibly some of these characteristics are not crucial for every city or even do not create and sustain smartness for others.
